Introduction

Fuma is a Japanese singer and dancer under HYBE Labels Japan. He is best known as the sub-leader and vocalist of the Japanese boy group &TEAM.

In 2022, Fuma participated in the survival show "&AUDITION - The Howling -" where he qualified to join the Japanese boy group &TEAM.
